# Aletheia

> Multi-agent AI system coordinating 6 specialized agents through Signal messaging.

Self-hosted, privacy-first. 6 nous (agents) + 1 human in distributed cognition topology. Dual-layer memory system with automatic fact extraction.

## Documentation
- [README.md](README.md): Architecture, directory structure, agents, deployment, configuration
- [ALETHEIA.md](ALETHEIA.md): System manifesto and naming philosophy
- [RESCUE.md](RESCUE.md): Full recovery guide from scratch
- [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md): Change history with decision context

## Key Directories
- [nous/](nous/): Agent workspaces (SOUL.md, AGENTS.md, MEMORY.md per agent)
- [shared/bin/](shared/bin/): ~70 shared scripts (on PATH for all agents)
- [shared/templates/](shared/templates/): Template compilation for workspace files
- [shared/config/](shared/config/): Environment, tools, provider failover
- [shared/contracts/](shared/contracts/): Agent capability contracts (JSON)
- [infrastructure/runtime/](infrastructure/runtime/): Aletheia gateway (TypeScript, clean-room)
- [infrastructure/memory/](infrastructure/memory/): Mem0 sidecar + Qdrant + Neo4j

## Memory System
- [infrastructure/memory/sidecar/](infrastructure/memory/sidecar/): Mem0 FastAPI extraction service
- [infrastructure/memory/plugin/](infrastructure/memory/plugin/): Aletheia memory plugin (lifecycle hooks)
- [infrastructure/runtime/src/organon/built-in/](infrastructure/runtime/src/organon/built-in/): Built-in tools (exec, grep, message, memory search)
- [shared/memory/facts.jsonl](shared/memory/facts.jsonl): Structured fact store

## Agents
- **Syn**: Orchestrator, primary interface (Signal DM default)
- **Eiron**: MBA coursework, academic
- **Demiurge**: Creative, craft, leatherwork
- **Syl**: General assistant, family (family group chat)
- **Arbor**: Work / Summus healthcare (Arbor group chat)
- **Akron**: Vehicle, preparedness, technical
